description: A simple but delicious warm salad with plenty of herby green goodness and a bit of spice.
keywords: Grain salad,Zucchini,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Grilled Zucchini, Pea & Mixed Grain Salad with Mint Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the zucchini in thin strips using a vegetable peeler, brush with a little olive oil and sprinkle over thyme and half the lemon zest.
Place a large griddle pan over on medium high heat and grill the zucchini slices for a minute on each side, cooking in batches.
Whisk the olive oil, lemon juice and remaining zest with the harissa paste in a small bowl.
Cook the mixed grain packs in the microwave according to pack instructions and pour into a large bowl, mix with a fork and pour over the dressing.
Bring a pan of salted water to the boil and cook the peas for 3 minutes and drain, and add to the grain mix with the zucchini, spring onions, fresh mint and cracked black pepper.
Add the peas, zucchini, spring onions, fresh mint and cracked black pepper to the grains, mix well and serve.
